body:
New version 2.47.2.
Compiles in parallel for all options. One must remove the +svg option on the cairo dependency to avoid the cyclic dependency in issue #24271 but it is left in this commit because the problem lies within the cairo package.
Dependency on sed was forgottten.
Configure expects --with-stufff{includedir,libdir}= for "zlib", "expat", "java".
Version 2.38.0 is set as deprecated.
Also bison build with 2.3 does not work (tested on MacOS BigSur), on the contrary to what is stated on the official web page of graphviz at
https://graphviz.org/download/source/
title: graphviz: new version 2.47.2 and dependencies altered.
